
;; scratch
(. System exit 0)

(use 'clojure.contrib.math)

(map (fn [x] (* (rand) x)) (range 10))

(init-weight 10 5)

(apply + (map * [1 2 3] [4 5 5]))
w2
w3
inp0

; test data
(reset! w2 '[[0.5 0.7 0.1 0.3] [0.9 0.2 0.5 0.5]])
(reset! w3 '[[1.0 0.3 0.7]])
(reset! inp0 '[128 -100 0 100])

(operate-3 inp0)

(normalize-input-data '(0 128 -128 64 -64))

((0.13962252985559132 0.10778548175727964 0.4161942556769679 0.8385183858252218 0.48492264787454264)
 (0.039717859408907485 0.10907994625974315 0.20057029231709567 0.7338548969930504 0.426401786087084)
 (0.893833898412946 0.34239170884658865 0.12324739406719709 0.8360713830075384 0.9473294279835379))


((0.43454747978776664 0.6340475787214104 0.03803781809321849 0.23667658656356705)
 (0.22024784923778384 0.48596677445581704 0.6679216152208756 0.30088305005216676))
